ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in Sony Effio-E DSP, More advanced 1/3" 960H CCD image sensor. Horizontal high resolution 700 TV Lines.
36 pcs IR Infrared LED illuminators for night vision, 100 ft (30m) IR range. OSD functions.
2.8 -12mm varifocal mega pixel lens with wide view angle, 0 Lux /F1.2 (IR LED on).
Vandal-proof design, Multi-Axis for wall or ceiling mounting, weatherproof: IP66.
All in one IR dome security camera with cable. Power supply not included.
ProductInfo.Name: Dome Security Camera 36pcs Infrared LEDs Advanced Sony Effio-E DSP 960H CCD 700 TVL 2.8 - 12mm Varifocal Lens Vandal proof High Resolution 100 ft IR Range Color Wide Angle View Day Night Vision for CCTV DVR Home Office Surveillance Secure System Indoor Outdoor Weatherproof DC 12V External Focus Adjustment with OSD Control White
